main event: The reported sighting took place off the Pacific Coast, USA on June 6, 1952, and involved a brilliant light described as circular and about 30 feet in diameter.
interesting points: The UFO sighting was reported to have occurred at a specific geographical location with exact latitude and longitude coordinates.
The source and reliability of the report were attributed to the Office Pacific consultant USA and rated at level 3.
The object was observed by a passenger on a Pan American Liner, adding credibility to the witness account.
The sighting involved a peculiar bluish-white spherical object with undulating lines emerging from it, suggesting a figure eight in outline.
The witness noted that the duration of the observation was approximately 1/4 of an hour.
Photographs were not mentioned in the report.
sighted object: brilliant light, circular, about 30 feet in diameter
